meanings.definition: A vehicle with two wheels in tandem, pedals connected to the rear wheel by a chain, handlebars for steering, and a saddle-like seat.
meanings.sent1: My brother's bicycle is red and shiny.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy riding my bicycle in the park.
meanings.sent3: The bicycle race was full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a bicycle light in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bicycle bell echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To ride or travel on a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: I will bicycle to school tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She bicycles to work every day to stay fit.
meanings.sent3: He decided to bicycle to the grocery store for some exercise.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as I bicycled through the countryside.
meanings.sent5: Bicycling along the beach at sunset is so peaceful.
